attributes.action: Cease pay for all MPs until Brexit is implemented.
attributes.additional_details:
23 MPs from remain seats voted to leave the EU against their constituents.

427 MPs in leave seats voted to remain.

Parliament on this issue is no longer answerable to their constituents.
attributes.background:
The political elite seek to frustrate and delay the will of the majority in implementing Brexit.

Since the majority of MPs are not acting in good faith to implement their manifestos or the referendum, we believe they should forfeit pay until the UK leaves the European Union.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
